posts.post_content:
REDUCED: I have for sale the following T3's from my collection:

#89-Lou Criger, BGS 2 GOOD, (Lower corner of case is chipped), checklist back, SOLD

#84-George Browne BGS 1 Poor, (Top right corner is chipped/piece missing), checklist back, $65.00

#83-Al Bridwell, ungraded, creases, left top and bottom corner missing, pinhole, checklist back, SOLD

#86-Bill Carrigan, ungraded, missing pieces, pinholes, rough, cheap type card or filler, advertising back, $35.00

All price include USPS shipping with tracking and are PAYPAL net to me. If you have any questions let me know. Thanks for looking. Tom
Bumped for price reduction on remaining cards. Or will consider trades for autographed Cubs, Bulls jerseys, etc. or possible other signed items. Thanks
Bump for price reduction on remaining two cards.
